name: 'Star Trek' Guest Stars, Part II Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What actress portrayed the green Orion slave girl in 'The Menagerie' flashbacks (TOS)?
questions.explanation:
Susan Oliver.

	She played Vina and all the fantasy women in the flashbacks with young Capt Pike during the court martial. She even played the green-skinned Orion dancer. During post-production, the film developers thought that there was a problem with the film and were intentionally making the dancer look 'normal' instead of green.

questions.text: In 'Star Trek: Insurrection', Sojef is played by this former star of 'Hardcastle and McCormick'.
questions.explanation:
Daniel Hugh Kelly.

	Brian Keith played the Bajoran farmer Mullibok on DS9 episode 'Progress'.

questions.text: This actor played Sovak the Ferengi on TNG before playing Rom on a recurring basis on DS9.
questions.explanation:
Max Grodenchik.

	Sovak wanted the artifact that Vash was looking for too.

questions.text: This child actor, who was in his own series 'Gentle Ben', played Balok of the First Federation in TOS episode 'The Corbomite Maneuver'.
questions.explanation:
Clint Howard.

	Yet his brother Ron had nothing to do with directing this episode 8-)

questions.text: This 'Dynasty' star died tragically in TOS Episode 'The City on the Edge of Forever'.
questions.explanation:
Joan Collins.

	Her character, Edith Keeler, would've delayed US entry into WWII and allowed Germany to take over the planet.

questions.text: This actor played Commodore Mendez is TOS episode 'The Menagerie' and Senator Pardek in TNG episode 'Unification'.
questions.explanation:
Malachi Throne.

	He also did The Keeper's voice in the flashback scenes in 'The Menagerie', aka the original pilot 'The Cage'.

questions.text: This actress played three different doctors: Dr. Ann Mulhall and Dr. Miranda Jones in two TOS episodes, and Dr. Kate Pulaski throughout the 2nd season of TNG.
questions.explanation:
Diana Muldaur.

	She did NOT sing 'Midnight at the Oasis'. That was Maria Muldar.

questions.text: This young actor played Jeremy Aster in TNG episode 'The Bonding' and Hob, the evil drug-dealing kid in Robocop 2.
questions.explanation:
Gabriel Damon.

	Strange plot: Worf bonds with Jeremy in a Klingon ritual, then young Jeremy is never seen again.

questions.text: She played Nurse Ogawa (and Dr. Ogawa in one episode) on several episodes of TNG.
questions.explanation:
Patti Yasutake.

	Rosalind Chao played Miles O'Brien's wife Keiko on TNG and {DS9;} Michelle Krusiec played 18-year-old Molly O'Brien in DS9 episode 'Time's {Orphan';} and Demora Sulu is Hikaru Sulu's daughter, who served as an ensign on the Enterprise-B in Star Trek: Generations.

questions.text: He played Grand Nagus Zek on DS9.
questions.explanation:
Wallace Shawn.

	He also played Vizzini the Sicillian in The Princess Bride.
